name: Evolution in two steps (now for real)
name_original: Evolution in two steps (now for real)
description:
NOTE: This is a patched version of the game, fixing a bug when switching scenes (a typo in scene paths related to case-sensitivity in web export). The original version (submitted in time) can be found at https://michelle2.itch.io/evolution-in-two-step. Thanks to the organizers for allowing us to resubmit!

The game was developed for the Gamedev CUNI Jam 2022 by the Tripodiki team (Michelle2, LucikS, PSonicJ).

Theme: "The First Ever"

Description: You start as a cell in the ocean and your goal is to be the first ever to evolve to the next stage.

Controls:

  • W/S - for movement
  • Space - for eating (don't be afraid to spam the button :D)
